author: Megan Ellis
title: Watch: Angry elephant kills buffalo
text:
Need a flight? We'll scan dozens of airlines and get you the best fare in seconds! Watch: Angry elephant kills buffalo Article By: Megan Ellis Tue, 06 Oct 2015 3:36 PM Share Your Email Credit: Kruger Sightings/YouTube 
A rare sighting has been published online, showing a buffalo being stabbed and killed by a territorial elephant. 
The video of the incident was uploaded by Kruger Sightings . It has amassed over 18 000 views since Monday. 
The video shows the buffalo lying down, however it attempts to run away as the elephant charges it. 
The elephant then stabs the buffalo with its tusks until the poor buffalo dies. 
Onlookers are shocked by the sight. 
Few details are available on what led the elephant to charge the buffalo. However elephants are known to sometimes kill other animals such as rhino.
